translation.ja: 他の誰とも感じた事のない

translation.en: [Kevin] It was like talking to someone with a completely like mind.
translation.ja: 心から気の合う相手だった “ノースハンプトンへ ようこそ”

translation.en: [DB] Because here, among the Turtles' sleepy New England origins,
translation.ja: この地で タートルズが生まれ

translation.en: a friendship was made,
translation.ja: 友情が築かれた

translation.en: and maybe today, renewed.
translation.ja: 今日 再始されるかも

translation.en: [Peter] I think Kevin's a really cool guy.
translation.ja: 立派な奴だよ

translation.en: And one of the regrets I have about what happened
translation.ja: 僕の唯一の後悔の１つは

translation.en: is that I no longer have that guy in my life, really.
translation.ja: 彼を失ってしまった事だ

translation.en: I miss Pete terribly, but it's a tough bridge to rebuild.
translation.ja: 彼がとても恋しいが 仲直りはとても難しい

translation.en: Oh, it's so nice to see you, really...
translation.ja: 会えて嬉しいよ

translation.en: I can look back, it was the height of the Turtles,
translation.ja: 当時は タートルズ全盛期時 彼は８歳上で 結婚もしてた

translation.en: Peter is eight years older than I am.
translation.ja: タートルズ全盛期時 彼は８歳上で 結婚もしてた

translation.en: He's very settled in his life. I'm 23 years old.
translation.ja: タートルズ全盛期時 彼は８歳上で 結婚もしてた 23歳で金もだいぶ入り 独身だった

translation.en: I have a little bit of cash, and I'm single.
translation.ja: 23歳で金もだいぶ入り 独身だった

translation.en: Wasn't this done for the first toy fair?
translation.ja: 最初のおもちゃ祭の？

translation.en: Oh, yeah. That's right. Beginning of '88.
translation.ja: そうさ　88年のね

translation.en: I pushed him away because I was younger and I wanted to do other things and I had a whole...
translation.ja: 彼にきつく当たった 若くて 色々他の事にも

translation.en: A whole world I wanted to see.
translation.ja: 挑戦したくて

translation.en: -We had that window installed. -Yeah.
translation.ja: 窓があったよね

translation.en: Because our big idea was, we'd each have a drawing table next to the window.
translation.ja: 僕達の計画は 各自の机を窓の横に置き

translation.en: -I'd be in the other room, you'd be here. -Yep.
translation.ja: 部屋の間に窓があって

translation.en: And we'd literally pass pages through the window.
translation.ja: 紙を窓から渡せる様な感じ

translation.en: It never happened.
translation.ja: 諦めたが

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: Everywhere we are in our relationship now is because of what I did to it.
translation.ja: 僕のせいで ２人はこうなってしまった

translation.en: Hindsight being 20/20,
translation.ja: 反省してるよ

translation.en: I'd have done a lot more things differently, back in those days.
translation.ja: 昔に戻って やり直せたらいいけど

translation.en: Those days, I look back on them very fondly.
translation.ja: とてもいい思い出だよ

translation.en: Cowabunga. Wow, what is that from?
translation.ja: いいね どこからの？

translation.en: Really, at that point, we were interested in having fun drawing.
translation.ja: 昔はとにかく 描くのを楽しんでて

translation.en: We were Turtle dads. We enjoyed our kids, we took great care of our kids.
translation.ja: 生みの親だもんね 育てて 成功させた

translation.en: And they've been adopted by someone else.
translation.ja: 誰かの養子になって

translation.en: I inked a certain character. You inked certain characters.
translation.ja: それぞれで 絵を描いたね

translation.en: [Peter] But I made it a point in the negotiations with Viacom,
translation.ja: バイアコムとの交渉では 僕が自主出版できる 権利も確認した

translation.en: to retain the rights to self-publish the Turtle comic if I so desired.
translation.ja: 僕が自主出版できる 権利も確認した

translation.en: I just couldn't live without that possibility in my life.
translation.ja: そこだけは 譲れなかったから

translation.en: And you know, maybe someday we'll do it again.
translation.ja: いつか僕らでするかも

translation.en: [DB] Time will tell,
translation.ja: 将来

translation.en: if we'll see Eastman and Laird return to where it all started.
translation.ja: それは実現するかもしれない

translation.en: Just two guys making each other laugh.
translation.ja: ただ楽しんで描く

translation.en: And inking each other's pencils.
translation.ja: 協力して制作する

translation.en: [Peter] It would be a nice,
translation.ja: 叶うといいね

translation.en: circling around way back to the beginning,
translation.ja: 元祖タートルズを描いてた

translation.en: where Kevin and I did those original Turtle comics together.
translation.ja: 昔の２人に戻るのも

translation.en: And I miss that.
translation.ja: 懐かしいよ

translation.en: Are you gonna pencil your favorite Turtle or ink it?
translation.ja: 鉛筆描き？ インク描き？

translation.en: Pencil it. No wait, I'm drawing Raphatello or Donanardo?
translation.ja: 鉛筆でお願い キャラは誰？
